ygData.subject: Re: Chain vs. snare
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Please don t read this the wrong way:  What level is your snarer?  Fights get much longer as you get higher in level, and as I ve mentioned, the problems
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 25 Aug 1999, Peter Reiter wrote:
>
> Let me give you a snarers perspective (my bard is only level 5, so I have no
> personal experience with chain, except when it cancels my snares.
>
> Snare is an amazing spell. It almost always lasts the entire combat.

Please don't read this the wrong way: What level is your
snarer? Fights get much longer as you get higher in level,
and as I've mentioned, the problems I've been having around
level 30 have been snares expiring and mobs running, at which
point I have to chase and chain them (which is *not* a good
thing when I've been busy keeping two mobs mesmerized with
Pixie Strike). I dunno, maybe the ranger has been casting
them too early.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
